meanings.definition: Doth: archaic third person singular present of do
meanings.sent2: He doth work hard every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat doth chase the mouse around the house.
meanings.sent4: Time doth fly when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The sun doth rise in the east every morning.

meanings.definition: Doth: does or performs an action
meanings.sent1: The bird doth build a nest in the tree.
meanings.sent2: He doth cook dinner for his family.
meanings.sent3: The robot doth dance in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: Laughter doth light up a room like sunshine.
meanings.sent5: Kindness doth make the world a better place.
